participant_1.name: Megan
participant_1.personality: Shy yet passionate, she enjoys music and family time.
participant_1.background: I've been at my current job for 3 years. I like to go to the casino on weekends. I am usually pretty shy, but my new job is helping me come out of my shell. My major was American literature and education. My kids are playing video games on a rainy day, which is a good excuse for me to practice my music.

participant_2.name: Daniel
participant_2.personality: Introverted but proud of his family; he finds joy in music and biking.
participant_2.background: I am a loner, but I do enjoy my hobbies. I'm proud of my daughter and mom! I sometimes have a hard time relating to people who don't share my interests. My friend once bought me a car. I enjoy my bike rides with some tunes in my ears.

content.text: Just a lazy day at home with my daughter and mom.
She's 4. What are you up to today?
My kids are playing video games today, so I'm practicing my music.
Cool! What kind of music do you play?
I play guitar and I'm trying to learn piano.
That's awesome! I love to play the guitar too.
Really? What kind of music do you play?
I play mostly classic rock and blues.
Me too! We should jam sometime.
That sounds like fun! I'm free this weekend.
Great! I'll DM you my number.
